TEXT.S: Pasumaq i Pingtung a kuwan nu Kalinku ku niyazu' nu Pasumaq. u kasalumaluma' nu Pasumaq sa, 109 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 339 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 320 ku tademaw, pakalatu 94%. u zuma sa, cay ku Ingcumin, 19 ku tademaw, pakalatu 6%. u kasabinacadan, Paiwan 92%, Rukai 1%, Bunun 1%, Amis 1%, zumazuma 1%.
